name: Splow
description:
Splow is a simple puzzle game about clearing snow. 

Take control of a slightly awkward snowplow and navigate the 20 puzzles that come bundled with the game.

Level editor
The level editor used to make all the games levels is built into the game.  Letting you create your own custom levels.

Online Level Browser (Coming Soon)
The ability to upload them to the in-game level browser for other players is coming soon!

Initially prototyped as part of Global Game Jam 2021
Currently Trying to get MacOS & Linux Builds working...
